metadata.feature_description: Search and filter pages based on workflow status and workflow assignment.

steps.expected: Pages panel displays with list of pages
steps.actual: Pages panel displayed showing 74 pages total

steps.action: Clicked on Search/Filter icon to access Advanced Filters
steps.expected: Advanced Filters panel opens with workflow dropdown
steps.actual: Advanced Filters panel opened with Page Type, Publish Status, Published Date Range, and Workflow filters

steps.action: Opened Workflow dropdown to view available workflows
steps.expected: Workflow dropdown shows available workflows to filter by
steps.actual: Dropdown displayed: None, Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Approval Workflow, QA Test Workflow, Test <Special> & "Chars"

steps.expected: Pages list filters to show only pages with Content Approval workflow
steps.actual: Results filtered from 74 pages to 10 pages with Content Approval workflow

steps.action: Entered 'Workflow' in search box while Content Approval workflow filter active
steps.expected: Search combines with workflow filter to show matching results
steps.actual: Search combined with workflow filter reduced results to 5 pages containing 'Workflow' text with Content Approval workflow

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Combine workflow filter with other filters

steps.action: Opened Publish Status dropdown to add additional filter
steps.expected: Publish Status dropdown opens with available options
steps.actual: Dropdown displayed with All, Draft, Published options

steps.action: Selected 'Draft' publish status along with Content Approval workflow
steps.expected: Combined filters show pages that match both criteria
steps.actual: Combined filters applied showing pages that are Draft status AND have Content Approval workflow

steps.action: Examined filtered results to verify workflow assignment on displayed pages
steps.expected: All pages in results have the selected workflow assigned
steps.actual: All displayed pages showed 'Content Approval' workflow status and Draft publish status, confirming filter accuracy

steps.action: Cleared filters and checked total page count display
steps.expected: Page count updates correctly when filters are applied/removed
steps.actual: Total count displayed '75 PAGES FOUND' with all filters cleared. When workflow filter applied, count updated to reflect filtered subset. UI displays all results in scrollable list without traditional page-by-page pagination

observations: The SearchPages API endpoint supports filtering by workflowId parameter (code line 97-98 in EvoqPagesController.cs)
API supports combining multiple filter parameters: searchKey, pageType, tags, publishStatus, publishDateStart, publishDateEnd, workflowId, pageIndex, pageSize
UI implements workflow filtering through Advanced Filters panel accessible via search icon
Pagination parameters (pageIndex, pageSize) are supported at API level, but UI displays all results in scrollable list rather than traditional page-by-page navigation
Workflow filter works correctly in combination with search text and publish status filters
